hero.subtitle: MoonRise’s RWA technical infrastructure. Standards, contract models, and on-chain monitoring for real-estate sector operations with independent partners.
hero.legalLine: Moon+ is technical infrastructure. Execution by SPVs and partner companies, with public and auditable rules. We do not intermediate securities. We are not a broker.

cards.d: Official wallets and public, auditable rules.
Processes and covenants without interfering in operations.
Infrastructure to connect with sector companies.
Transparent tracking with metrics and events.

how.title: How we operate

steps.d: Screening of partners and sector opportunities.

how.note: No promise of returns. Operations subject to risks and legal requirements.

relation.title: Relationship & independence
relation.desc: Moon+ is technical infrastructure. Operations are conducted by SPVs and partner companies, legally independent and without cross-liability. Flows and rules follow public contracts, traceable on-chain. No brokerage.

items.d: Publish the RWA thesis, standard SPV, and partner base.
Pilot projects with sector companies and public reports.
Scale operations, new assets, and reports portal v1.

items.a: No. Moon+ is technical infrastructure. Operations are conducted by SPVs/partners.
Through public rules and official on-chain wallets, with periodic reports.
Sector companies and independent SPVs, responsible for their obligations.

disclaimer: No promise of returns. Operations subject to market risks, legal requirements, and strategic adjustments.
